verses.verse: Let every <S%G3956><s%> person <S%G5590><s%> be in subjection <S%G5293><s%> to the governing <S%G5242><s%> authorities. <S%G1849><s%> For there is no <S%G3756><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> from God, <S%G2316><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> which exist <S%G1510><s%> are established <S%G5021><s%> by God. <S%G2316><s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> he who resists <S%G436><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> has opposed <S%G436><s%> the ordinance <S%G1296><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and they who have opposed <S%G436><s%> will receive <S%G2983><s%> condemnation <S%G2917><s%> upon themselves. <S%G1438><s%>

For rulers <S%G758><s%> are not a cause <S%G5401><s%> of fear <S%G5401><s%> for good <S%G18><s%> behavior, <S%G2041><s%> but for evil. <S%G2556><s%> Do you want <S%G2309><s%> to have <S%G5399><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> of authority <S%G1849><s%>? Do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G18><s%> is good, <S%G18><s%> and you will have <S%G2192><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> from the same; <S%G846><s%>

for it is a minister <S%G1249><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to you for good. <S%G18><s%> But if <S%G1437><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G2556><s%> is evil, <S%G2556><s%> be afraid; <S%G5399><s%> for it does not bear <S%G5409><s%> the sword <S%G3162><s%> for nothing; <S%G1500><s%> for it is a minister <S%G1249><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> an avenger <S%G1558><s%> who brings wrath <S%G3709><s%> upon the one who practices <S%G4238><s%> evil. <S%G2556><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> it is necessary <S%G318><s%> to be in subjection, <S%G5293><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of wrath, <S%G3709><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> for conscience' sake. <S%G1223><s%>

For because <S%G1223><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> pay <S%G5055><s%> taxes, <S%G5411><s%> for [rulers] are servants <S%G3011><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> devoting <S%G4342><s%> themselves <S%G4342><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> very <S%G846><s%> thing. <S%G3778><s%>

Render <S%G591><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> what <S%G3782><s%> is due <S%G3782><s%> them: tax <S%G5411><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> tax <S%G5411><s%> [is due;] custom <S%G5056><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> custom; <S%G5056><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> fear; <S%G5401><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> honor. <S%G5092><s%>

Owe <S%G3784><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> to anyone <S%G3367><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> to love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another; <S%G240><s%> for he who loves <S%G25><s%> his neighbor <S%G2087><s%> has fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> [the] law. <S%G3551><s%>

For this, <S%G3588><s%> "You shall not commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery, <S%G3431><s%> You shall not murder, <S%G5407><s%> You shall not steal, <S%G2813><s%> You shall not covet, <S%G1937><s%>" and if <S%G1487><s%> there is any <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> commandment, <S%G1785><s%> it is summed <S%G346><s%> up in this <S%G3778><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> "You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%>"

Love <S%G26><s%> does <S%G2038><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> wrong <S%G2556><s%> to a neighbor; <S%G4139><s%> love <S%G26><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> is the fulfillment <S%G4138><s%> of [the] law. <S%G3551><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> [do,] knowing <S%G3609><s%> the time, <S%G2540><s%> that it is already <S%G2235><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> for you to awaken <S%G1453><s%> from sleep; <S%G5258><s%> for now <S%G3568><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> is nearer <S%G1451><s%> to us than <S%G2228><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we believed. <S%G4100><s%>

The night <S%G3571><s%> is almost <S%G4298><s%> gone, <S%G4298><s%> and the day <S%G2250><s%> is at hand. <S%G1448><s%> Let us therefore <S%G3767><s%> lay <S%G659><s%> aside <S%G659><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%> and put <S%G1746><s%> on the armor <S%G3696><s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%>

Let us behave <S%G4043><s%> properly <S%G2156><s%> as in the day, <S%G2250><s%> not in carousing <S%G2970><s%> and drunkenness, <S%G3178><s%> not in sexual <S%G2845><s%> promiscuity <S%G2845><s%> and sensuality, <S%G766><s%> not in strife <S%G2054><s%> and jealousy. <S%G2205><s%>

But put <S%G1746><s%> on the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and make <S%G4160><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> provision <S%G4307><s%> for the flesh <S%G4561><s%> in regard <S%G1519><s%> to [its] lusts. <S%G1939><s%>
